Student Development Program

Comprehensive programs designed to nurture well-rounded individuals prepared for future success.

Our Development Programs

We believe in holistic development that goes beyond academics to prepare students for real-world challenges and opportunities.

Academic Excellence Program

A structured program to help students excel in academics through personalized learning plans, remedial classes, and advanced learning opportunities.

All grades (6th-10th)

Skill Development Initiative

Equipping students with 21st-century skills including digital literacy, coding, financial literacy, and communication skills.

All grades (6th-10th)

Career Guidance & Counseling

Professional guidance to help students explore career options, prepare for competitive exams, and make informed decisions about higher education.

All grades (6th-10th)

Leadership & Life Skills

Developing essential life skills, leadership qualities, and emotional intelligence through workshops, activities, and real-world projects.

All grades (6th-10th)

Program Gallery

Visual glimpses of our student development activities.

Academic Excellence Program

Program Overview

A structured program to help students excel in academics through personalized learning plans, remedial classes, and advanced learning opportunities.

Key Components

  • Personalized learning plans based on student's strengths and areas for improvement
  • Regular assessments and feedback to track progress
  • Remedial classes for students needing additional support
  • Advanced learning opportunities for high-performing students

Expected Outcomes

Improved academic performance, higher test scores, and better conceptual understanding of subjects.

Program Details

Duration

Throughout academic year

Eligibility

All students (Grades 6-10)

Schedule

Integrated with regular curriculum

Facilitators

Specialized faculty & external experts

Assessment

Continuous evaluation & feedback

Skill Development Initiative

Program Overview

Equipping students with 21st-century skills including digital literacy, coding, financial literacy, and communication skills.

Key Components

  • Digital literacy and basic programming skills
  • Financial literacy and entrepreneurship basics
  • Communication and presentation skills
  • Critical thinking and problem-solving workshops

Expected Outcomes

Acquisition of practical skills relevant for future education and employment opportunities.

Program Details

Duration

Throughout academic year

Eligibility

All students (Grades 6-10)

Schedule

Integrated with regular curriculum

Facilitators

Specialized faculty & external experts

Assessment

Continuous evaluation & feedback

Career Guidance & Counseling

Program Overview

Professional guidance to help students explore career options, prepare for competitive exams, and make informed decisions about higher education.

Key Components

  • One-on-one career counseling sessions
  • Career exploration workshops and field trips
  • Preparation for competitive exams
  • Higher education guidance and scholarship information

Expected Outcomes

Informed career choices, better preparation for higher education, and increased success in competitive exams.

Program Details

Duration

Throughout academic year

Eligibility

All students (Grades 6-10)

Schedule

Integrated with regular curriculum

Facilitators

Specialized faculty & external experts

Assessment

Continuous evaluation & feedback

Leadership & Life Skills

Program Overview

Developing essential life skills, leadership qualities, and emotional intelligence through workshops, activities, and real-world projects.

Key Components

  • Leadership development through student council and committees
  • Emotional intelligence and conflict resolution training
  • Time management and goal setting workshops
  • Team building and collaborative project work

Expected Outcomes

Development of leadership qualities, improved emotional intelligence, and better interpersonal skills.

Program Details

Duration

Throughout academic year

Eligibility

All students (Grades 6-10)

Schedule

Integrated with regular curriculum

Facilitators

Specialized faculty & external experts

Assessment

Continuous evaluation & feedback

Success Stories

How our development programs have transformed students' lives.

Priya Sharma

Academic Excellence Program

From struggling with mathematics to securing 95% in SSLC, Priya's journey showcases the impact of personalized learning plans and dedicated mentoring.

Outcome: Currently pursuing Science at a prestigious PU College

Rajesh Kumar

Skill Development Initiative

Rajesh discovered his passion for programming through our coding workshops. He developed a mobile app that helps farmers access market prices.

Outcome: Selected for a national-level innovation competition

Anita Reddy

Leadership & Life Skills

As a shy student, Anita found her voice through our leadership program. She led a successful community service project that impacted over 200 villagers.

Outcome: Elected as School Student Council President

Kittur Rani Chennamma

Kittur Rani Chennamma Residential School, Balepura, Devanahalli - Providing quality residential education for rural students.
